meanings.definition: Unable to be imagined or conceived.
meanings.sent1: The size of the universe is unimaginable to my young mind.
meanings.sent2: The concept of time travel is truly unimaginable.
meanings.sent3: Trying to fit an elephant in a tiny box is unimaginable!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was as vast and unimaginable as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The pain he felt was unimaginable, like a thousand needles stabbing at once.

meanings.definition: Beyond the limits of what can be imagined or believed.
meanings.sent1: The magician's trick was so unimaginable, it left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent2: The beauty of the sunset was truly unimaginable.
meanings.sent3: A cat riding a skateboard would be unimaginable, but hilarious!
meanings.sent4: The athlete's speed was unimaginable, like a cheetah racing across the savannah.
meanings.sent5: The mountain peak was so high, it seemed unimaginable to reach the top.
